title: Drawing, Pair of Scissors with Handles Formed by Seated Half-pairs of Facing Llamas, or Camels.
title_raw: Pair of Scissors with Handles Formed by Seated Half-pairs of Facing Llamas, or Camels.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Pair of Scissors with Handles Formed by Seated Half-pairs of Facing Llamas, or Camels.. Pen and ink, brush and gray wash on heavy off-white paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-5462
